alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Dubois; Martin; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 29 at 9:52PM EDT until April 03 at 11:25AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Rivervale....down to Shoals. .Widespread lowland flooding continues along the East Fork White River from near Rivervale to all points downstream. The crest on the East Fork White River will pass Bedford by dawn Thursday. Minor flooding is expected to continue for these portions of the river through early next week...although rain going into the weekend may extend flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River at Shoals. * WHEN...Until late Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.7 feet, During prolonged high water of late March and early April 2008, Windom Road had one lane open. On March 11, 2011 SR 550 just south of Loogootee was closed by high water on the south side of the river. At least one nearby county road was flooded. Considerable lowland flooding in progress. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 21.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM EDT Wednesday was 21.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 23.4 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage late Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated by noon Thursday.
